General.Name: Almunajem Foods Company SJSC
General.Description: Almunajem Foods Company engages in the import, marketing, and distribution of frozen, chilled, and dry foodstuffs in Saudi Arabia. It also offers logistical services, including storage and transportation services. The company's poultry products include chicken and chicken products; meat; dairy products, including cheese, butter, cream, and evaporated milk; French fries; olives and olive oil, and sea food; fruits, which include avocado pulp; and basmati rice. It sells its products through wholesale, retail, and food service channels. The company serves catering companies, airlines, hotels, fast food restaurants, traditional restaurants, luxury restaurants, cafes, and juice shops; hypermarkets, supermarkets, superstores, mini markets, and baqalas; and small retailers and individual consumers. Almunajem Foods Company was founded in 1950 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Almunajem Foods Company is a subsidiary of Abdullah Ali Almunajem Sons Company.
